videos.title: Severance S2E1 ‘Hello, Ms. Cobel’ (2025)
videos.description: In the Severance Season 2 premiere, "Hello, Ms. Cobel," Mark S. awakens on the severed floor and discovers that five months have passed since the innies' revolt, with Mr. Milchick now managing the floor and new employees in the Macrodata Refinement department. As Mark grapples with these changes, he reunites with Helly, Dylan, and Irving, and they confront the implications of their uprising and the evolving dynamics within Lumon Industries.
videos.additional_info:
Severance S2E1 ‘Hello, Ms. Cobel’ (2025)
In the Severance Season 2 premiere, "Hello, Ms. Cobel," Mark S. awakens on the severed floor and discovers that five months have passed since the innies' revolt, with Mr. Milchick now managing the floor and new employees in the Macrodata Refinement department. As Mark grapples with these changes, he reunites with Helly, Dylan, and Irving, and they confront the implications of their uprising and the evolving dynamics within Lumon Industries.
Technique - Arc , Bolt Cam , X-Axis Arc
Director - Ben Stiller
DOP - Jessica Lee Gagné
Editor - Geoffrey Richman, Joe Landauer
Colorist - Company 3, Tom Poole

videos.alt_text: Pa Salieu - My Family feat BackRoad Gee
videos.title: Pa Salieu - My Family feat BackRoad Gee (2020)
videos.additional_info:
Pa Salieu - My Family feat BackRoad Gee (2020)
Music video for British rapper Pa Salieu, from director Femi Ladi. Utilizes a bolt arm camera that was popularized in Kendrick Lamar's 2017 music video, Humble, by director Dave Meyers. Ladi's decision to use a black and white color scheme gives this film an interesting juxtaposition between a timeless look, and modern camera techniques, with the help of the bolt arm.
Technique - Bolt Cam
Director - Femi Ladi
DOP - Stefan Yap
Original Source - Link
BLACK AND WHITE

videos.title: Kendrick Lamar - Humble (2017)
videos.description: The visually striking "Humble" music video, directed by Dave Meyer and reminiscent of Hype Williams' style, breathes life into Kendrick Lamar's ideas, setting the tone for his upcoming album, which appears to focus on his status as a superstar rather than a complex concept.
videos.additional_info:
Kendrick Lamar - Humble (2017)
The visually striking "Humble" music video, directed by Dave Meyer and reminiscent of Hype Williams' style, breathes life into Kendrick Lamar's ideas, setting the tone for his upcoming album, which appears to focus on his status as a superstar rather than a complex concept.
Technique - Bolt Cam
Director - Dave Meyers
DOP - Scott Cunningham

videos.title: Audrey Nuna - Cellulite (2023)
videos.description: Audrey Nuna's "Cellulite" music video, directed by Zac Dov, is a vivid narrative of self-liberation and defiance, drawing inspiration from icons like the Pharcyde and Missy Elliott. The video visually represents Nuna's personal theme of overcoming constraints, symbolized by motifs of flying and motion, reflecting her introspective yet rebellious spirit. It's a cinematic portrayal of cutting out life's "toxic fat," aiming to resonate with viewers on a journey of spiritual unburdening.
videos.additional_info:
Audrey Nuna - Cellulite (2023)
Audrey Nuna's "Cellulite" music video, directed by Zac Dov, is a vivid narrative of self-liberation and defiance, drawing inspiration from icons like the Pharcyde and Missy Elliott. The video visually represents Nuna's personal theme of overcoming constraints, symbolized by motifs of flying and motion, reflecting her introspective yet rebellious spirit. It's a cinematic portrayal of cutting out life's "toxic fat," aiming to resonate with viewers on a journey of spiritual unburdening.
Technique - Bolt Cam
Director - Zac Dov Wiesel
DOP - Gabe Knoos-Newton
Colorist - Brian Niles

videos.title: Victoria Monet - Alright (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "Alright" by Victoria Monét, directed by Dave Meyers, is a vibrant homage to Janet Jackson, featuring high-energy choreography and striking visuals. In the video, Monét channels Jackson's iconic style, wearing a black-and-white fedora and suit, and performing dynamic dance routines reminiscent of Jackson's 1990s and 2000s era. The video, choreographed by Sean Bankhead, showcases Monét's impressive dance skills and captures the essence of liberation and celebration. Made in collaboration with Jacobi Mehringer, Anna Arnell, and Mia Barnes.
videos.additional_info:
Victoria Monet - Alright (2024)

The video, choreographed by Sean Bankhead, showcases Monét's impressive dance skills and captures the essence of liberation and celebration. Made in collaboration with Jacobi Mehringer, Anna Arnell, and Mia Barnes.
Technique - Bolt Cam , Choreo , Projections
Director - Dave Meyers
DOP - Scott Cunningham
Editor - Vinnie Hobbs
Colorist - Dante Pasquinelli

videos.title: Kyan Khojandi - Haagen-Dazs (2021)
videos.description: Slow bolt arm shot in void environment. The BOLT was popularized in Dave Meyer's 'Humble' where it quickly moved around Kendrick. In this clip, we see it's use at a more normal speed.
videos.additional_info:
